scripts.journeyvienna-compile: npm run journeyvienna-scripts && npm run journeyvienna-styles
scripts.journeyvienna-dev: npm run journeyvienna-compile && npm run journeyvienna-build && npm run common-serve
scripts.journeyvienna-release: npm run journeyvienna-build && node deploy.js journeyvienna.at
scripts.journeyvienna-watch: nodemon --watch journeyvienna.at --ignore journeyvienna.at/static/scripts.js --ignore journeyvienna.at/static/styles.css --exec 'npm run journeyvienna-dev'
scripts.playvienna-compile: npm run playvienna-scripts && npm run playvienna-styles
scripts.playvienna-dev: npm run playvienna-compile && npm run playvienna-build && npm run common-serve
scripts.playvienna-release: npm run playvienna-build && node deploy.js playvienna.com
scripts.playvienna-watch: nodemon --watch playvienna.com --ignore playvienna.com/static/scripts.js --ignore playvienna.com/static/styles.css --exec 'npm run playvienna-dev'
